nodes.text: LEGO Star Wars: Vader's Secret Missions

LEGO Star Wars: Vader's Secret Missions is a LEGO Star Wars book about Darth Vader from Scholastic Inc. The author is Ace Landers, and it was published on April 28, 2015. The book features a history of the Sith and three short stories: "The Emperor's New Clones", "Every Darth Has His Day", and "Who's Afraid of the Big Bad Sith?"
"Three original stories starring the greatest villain in LEGO(R) STAR WARS(TM) history!!
Darth Vader, the ultimate Sith Lord, has decades of stories to tell! This humorous and action-packed book features all of our favorite heroes and villains in three BRAND-NEW original stories!"

Though released on April 28, 2015, over year a after the announcement of a new continuity of canon, the title's stories are clearly set within the continuity of Star Wars Legends, referencing many story and historical elements found only within the Legends continuity.
